title: issue_clustering v2: Add cluster drift detection with alerts and audit trail

sections.text: Implement drift detection for issue_clustering v2 to identify when cluster assignments or embedding distributions shift beyond configured thresholds. Persist drift signals (timestamp, affected clusters, metrics) and surface a high-priority alert for triage when drift is detected. Include a lightweight audit trail linking drift events to the underlying source conversations and downstream engineering work for defensibility.
